text: The President of Iceland () is the head of state of Iceland. The incumbent is Halla Tómasdóttir, who became president in 2024. The president is elected to a four-year term by popular vote, is not term-limited, and has limited powers. The presidential residence is in Bessastaðir in Garðabær, near the capital city Reykjavík. ==List== There have been seven presidents since the creation of the republic.
